name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Statement
This account has been used by me alone from beginning to end
I will not join any organization in the past or in the future
All my contributions come from spontaneous contributions from everyone on the Internet. I do not pay any contributor, and no contributor pays me
This account focuses on providing information about what is happening in China and helping others speak out, that's all
Let us stick to decentralization to the end.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @zhangcunxiang If you check Fang Zhouzi's Twitter, you will know who I am.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
@IloveAmerica23 It depends on how you understand it.
What I mean by decentralization here is to go to the center of all controlled media in the country.
If someone thinks they are the center, then go to their center.
Of course, in a sense, I am also a center, so don't just listen to my voice.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
In Shangtang Township, Wuning County, Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, workers blocked the gate with a forklift due to unpaid wages for the project

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution Tonight, Chongqing Jiefangbei
A man set off fireworks to attract attention, then put a kitchen knife on his neck and used a microphone to express his demands.
He was then taken away by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @NmsleseBot Can’t you see it on the streets now?
